name: Frogger Returns (itch)
description:
Welcome to the most addictive game in the 80s, this is Frogger Returns, a frogger like game which will make you spend hours trying to get the little frogs into their houses!

Will you be able to pass all the levels?, it is really a hard work to survive being a frog...

Instructions:

The player starts with three lives. The player guides a frog which starts at the bottom of the screen. 

Frog cross every obstacles like below.

1. Road with motor vehicles speeding along it horizontally. 

2. River with log and turtles, all moving horizontally across the screen. 

3. Bush with snake, avoid snake.

4. Lava zone with safe stoen with timer.

5. Swamp with crocodile.

6. The very top of the screen contains five "Lily Pad" which are the destinations for each frog. 

Only Arrow key for movements;Good Game buddy!!!
